g1: Defeat at least 250 enemies on the golden Challenge Path
g2: Win 40 battles with a full squad of First Order
g3: Win 20 battles with a full squad of Light Side Mandalorians surviving
g4: Win 40 battles with Princess Kneesaa, Chief Chirpa, Wicket, Paploo, and Logray surviving
g5: Win at least 40 battles with a full squad of Rebel units
g6: Complete a battle with Overprepared I active
g7: Defeat 100 enemies with General Veers or Admiral Piett
g8: Complete a battle with Deployable Cooling Systems active
s1f1: Win 14 battles with a full squad of Resistance characters
s1f2: Gain We Adapt, or Die 50 times
s1f4: Attempt to inflict 500 stacks of Damage Over Time
s1m2: Win with only Dark Side characters
s1b2: Win with only Dark Side characters
s2f1: Win 14 battles with a full squad of Bounty Hunters
s2m1: Defeat an enemy with Scout Trooper
s2m2: Win with only Light Side characters
s2b2: Win without using any Jedi, Sith, or Unaligned Force Users in your squad
s3f1: Win 14 battles with a full squad of Tuskens
s3m1: Win with Commander Luke Skywalker Surviving
s3b1: Win with Jedi Knight Cal Kestis surviving
s3b2: Win with a full squad of Inquisitors
s4f1: Win 14 battles with a full squad of Light Side Unaligned Force Users
s4m1: Win with only Dark Side characters
s4b1: Win without using any Jedi, Sith, or Unaligned Force Users in your squad
s5f1: Defeat 50 enemies with Clone Trooper units
s5m1: Win with Dark Trooper Moff Gideon Surviving
s5m2: Win with only Light Side characters
s5b1: Win with a full squad of Resistance units
s5b2: Win with only Dark Side characters
